mapper.select: select r.* , (select count(review_idx) from REVIEW_LIKE where r.review_idx=review_idx) cnt, (select count(review_idx) from REVIEW_LIKE where r.review_idx=review_idx and mem_idx=#{m_idx}) heart_flag from (select * from REVIEW) r order by r.review_idx desc
